video.title: Longmire
video.synopsis: This contemporary crime thriller focuses on a Wyoming sheriff who's rebuilding his life and career following the death of his wife.

episodes.synopsis: With the help of Vic and Henry, Longmire investigates a backcountry murder with ties to a tribal family.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: When an exotic dancer turns up dead on Longmire's territory, he and his team quickly recognize that the victim is from out of town.
episodes.title: The Dark Road

episodes.synopsis: A barn goes down in flames with the owner and his beloved horses inside, and Longmire questions the theory that it was a suicide attempt.
episodes.title: A Damn Shame

episodes.synopsis: A lone fisherman hooks the bodies of two murdered men, once again reminding Longmire that his beloved West isn't the way it used to be.
episodes.title: The Cancer

episodes.synopsis: After a Cheyenne foster child goes missing, Walt and the team investigate the boy's birth family on the reservation.
episodes.title: Dog Soldier

episodes.synopsis: A body mauled by a bear is found in the woods, and Walt suspects that the bear was baited to attack.
episodes.title: The Worst Kind of Hunter

episodes.synopsis: A wealthy beer distributor is found viciously beaten, and Walt wonders why his attacker stole a seemingly worthless painting.
episodes.title: 8 Seconds

episodes.synopsis: Walt investigates the murder of a gas station owner who tried to help an unstable and barefoot young woman who claimed to be in danger.
episodes.title: An Incredibly Beautiful Thing

episodes.synopsis: When the Tribal Council president is found dead on county land, it's clear to Walt that the body was moved from the original crime scene. But why?
episodes.title: Dogs, Horses and Indians

episodes.synopsis: Walt investigates the murder of a teenager who was one of four boys acquitted of raping a developmentally disabled Cheyenne girl.
episodes.title: Unfinished Business

episodes.synopsis: Longmire risks his life to travel up a mountain by foot in a snowstorm to catch a group of escaped prisoners and their hostages.
episodes.title: Unquiet Mind

episodes.synopsis: Sheriff Longmire discovers that a man found dead in a compost heap had made lots of enemies, and Branch looks for help as he tries to find Cady.
episodes.title: Carcasses

episodes.synopsis: A murdered sheep farmer is killed over a deal to sell his land, and Cady goes to Denver to find answers about her mother's death.
episodes.title: Death Came in Like Thunder

episodes.synopsis: A truckload of cattle is stolen, and the original driver later turns up dead. Meanwhile, Vic receives a mysterious delivery of flowers from a possible admirer.
episodes.title: The Road to Hell

episodes.synopsis: A body found dumped in an alley leads Longmire to a gang dealing stolen prescription medications. Cady returns from investigating her mother's death.
episodes.title: Party's Over

episodes.synopsis: When an Indian psychic is found dead, the investigation leads Walt and his deputies to a missing girl and secret Indian grave sites.
episodes.title: Tell It Slant

episodes.synopsis: While serving at the Red Pony, Henry overhears a customer trying to organize a hit on his wife. When the customer leaves, Henry follows him to the car park to volunteer for the job.
episodes.title: Sound and Fury

episodes.synopsis: A foreman is found killed and dragging behind a horse after an illegal rodeo. Detective Fales arrives from Denver with some questions for Henry.
episodes.title: The Great Spirit

episodes.synopsis: A local Cheyenne is found dead in a house after a methane explosion, but the emotionally sensitive investigation could cost Longmire points in the upcoming election.
episodes.title: Tuscan Red

episodes.synopsis: The day of the sheriff's election arrives, but everybody is more concerned about Cady, who is critically injured in a hit-and-run accident.
episodes.title: Election Day

episodes.synopsis: The sheriff's office investigates the death of a game warden and the illegal shooting of an elk, as Branch contemplates his post-election future.
episodes.title: Natural Order

episodes.synopsis: Longmire needs Lucian Connally's help after a convicted dinosaur bone thief is killed in prison. An old enemy from Philadelphia harasses Vic.
episodes.title: A Good Death Is Hard to Find

episodes.synopsis: Branch ties a suspect to Cady's accident, Vic takes matters into her own hands with her stalker, and Fales turns up the heat on Walt and Henry.
episodes.title: Bad Medicine

episodes.synopsis: A peyote-laced feather and a bag of ashes figure into the team's investigation of the attack on Branch. Walt locates a witness for Henry’s defense.
episodes.title: The White Warrior

episodes.synopsis: Walt and Vic try to solve the murder of an adopted Russian teenager. Prison politics take their toll on Henry.
episodes.title: Of Children and Travelers

episodes.synopsis: Walt juggles an ongoing murder investigation and his duties as a stand-in judge for the Miss Cheyenne pageant; Cady looks to an old friend for help.
episodes.title: Miss Cheyenne

episodes.synopsis: After a wilderness leadership trip takes a dark turn, Walt and the team must track down a killer and missing teenage campers.
episodes.title: In the Pines

episodes.synopsis: Former sheriff Lucian Connally helps Walt hone in on suspects in his wife's murder, and Branch ramps up his off-the-books investigation.
episodes.title: Wanted Man

episodes.synopsis: When a man missing for 30 years shows up dead, Walt must deal with the media frenzy and determine if he really is the long-lost heir to a fortune.
episodes.title: Reports of My Death

episodes.synopsis: Vic's vacation weekend with her husband Sean goes terribly awry. Walt must forge an unlikely alliance to stage a rescue.
episodes.title: Population 25

episodes.synopsis: The investigation into a farmer's apparent murder is complicated by his insurance policy; Branch and Cady go to Denver seeking a lead in Henry's case.
episodes.title: Harvest

episodes.synopsis: Despite concerns about Branch's behavior, Walt makes a key discovery in the David Ridges case. Meanwhile, Henry faces a major setback.
episodes.title: Counting Coup

episodes.synopsis: Walt seeks closure for both his wife's murder and Henry's case; despite his suspension, Branch continues to investigate Jacob Nighthorse.
episodes.title: Ashes to Ashes

episodes.synopsis: The team struggles with the fallout from Branch's confrontation with Barlow, and Walt's crusade to bring Nighthorse to justice spins out of control.
episodes.title: Down by the River

episodes.synopsis: Walt is forced to split his focus between new evidence in a personal case, and the murder of a caretaker at a former Japanese internment camp.
episodes.title: War Eagle

episodes.synopsis: The investigation of Nighthorse heats up, but not in the way that Walt was hoping for. Cady makes a shocking discovery.
episodes.title: High Noon

episodes.synopsis: A body found in the luggage of a tour bus further complicates Walt's troubles with Nighthorse. Henry makes a bold move to help a mother and son.
episodes.title: Four Arrows

episodes.synopsis: When the husband of a former soldier is assaulted during an apparent robbery, Walt is drawn into an emotionally charged investigation.
episodes.title: Help Wanted

episodes.synopsis: A young Native American girl is raped on the reservation, which sparks new, volatile tensions between local oil rig workers and the Cheyenne people.
episodes.title: The Calling Back

episodes.synopsis: A highway robbery sets off an investigation into a strange relationship, while Walt struggles to let go of the past.
episodes.title: Highway Robbery

episodes.synopsis: When a former suspect in a rape case ends up dead in another county, Walt and Vic aren't convinced the death is an accident.
episodes.title: Hector Lives

episodes.synopsis: Henry's attempt at justice backfires, resulting in new problems for him and a new investigation for Walt.
episodes.title: Shotgun

episodes.synopsis: The line between justice and the law gets even blurrier for Henry and Walt as their hunt for a killer intensifies.
episodes.title: What Happens On The Rez...
